=== Welcome to the Xubuntu wiki! ===

You have landed in the Xubuntu team wiki. This is the place where the Xubuntu contributors cooperate and communicate about development efforts. If you are looking for general information about Xubuntu, please visit the <nowiki>[[http://xubuntu.org/|Xubuntu website]]</nowiki>. Among other things, the website features download links, team blog, list of support methods and information on how to start contributing.

If you are looking for our development mailing list, please navigate to the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/xubuntu-devel|xubuntu-devel mailing list information page]]</nowiki>.

You can read more about the principles behind Xubuntu in the <nowiki>[[http://xubuntu.org/about/|About]]</nowiki> page on our website or in the <nowiki>[[Xubuntu-StrategyDocument|Strategy Document]]</nowiki>.
